byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and STEVE EDER

abstract: Review of hundreds of pages of sworn testimony by Donald J Trump in lawsuits in past decade stemming from soured real estate deals shows his tendency to engage in hyperbole, shade the truth and deliver outright misstatements; testimony shows much about personal preoccupations and business strategy of Republican presidential candidate.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of pages of sworn testimony by Donald J. Trump over the past decade paint an unvarnished image of Mr. Trump as prone to overstatement and the occasional boorish outburst.

headline.main: Under Oath, Donald Trump Shows His Raw Side
headline.print_headline: Under Oath, Trump Shows His Raw Side

snippet: Hundreds of pages of sworn testimony by Donald J. Trump over the past decade paint an unvarnished image of Mr. Trump as prone to overstatement and the occasional boorish outburst.
